title: How do teachers develop leadership skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Teachers are the true leaders, who have to set the path for future students, leadership is not a possession, it's an action in reality. Hence, to develop leadership qualities in teachers, first thing is that, they should be responsible of their deeds, every action and every step taken by a teacher is actively observed by all students. It is proven that most of the children learn by observing things around them. The following are the best ways to develop the leadership skills among teachers. Accept responsibility and execute it as accepted.Accept additional responsibilities and commit yourself to the work accepted.Accept and delegate the true power of students.To be a great leader, every teacher should also develop communication skills.To be a leader, one should be an influencer, so, your deeds govern your qualities.Having a great empathy towards society and children is the next great quality that has to be nurtured to increase your leadership quality.Understanding students and their emotions, improving logical thinking and problem solving skills also define your leadership qualities.To be precise, leadership qualities can be developed only if teachers spend their extra time and effort to build students future. Thank You!
